website_summaries.verdict: Even with all of its extra features, skip the Yujin Robot iClebo Arte if stellar performance is your top goal.
pros: Yujin Robot's iClebo Arte brings several features that similarly priced robot vacuums lack
cons: The iClebo performs significantly worse than its competitiors

customer_reviews.title: Robot works ok, but customer service is poor/nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum cleaner works well on hardwood floors, not so well on carpet. It gets lost at times. It makes a lot of noise on the hardwood floor, so we investigated and found a part missing. We have trouble getting assistance from the vendor, manufacturer, customer service departments. We have not been able to get a small part and now we cannot use the robot. Purchased in June, 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 1500 sqf loft which is very dusty. This guy runs once every day on a timer, takes about 80 minutes to run through ~1200 sqf of hardwood and picks up all the dust and hair. The floor remain pretty clean. I see this as getting 80% clean with 0% effort. Come back from work, empty the dust bin. That's all I do to maintain this guy. Occasionally I have to go look for him as he doesn't find his way back getting stuck on something, but you will quickly learn what kind of wires and places he has trouble with and adapt. The summarize this, if he breaks, I'll buy another one without second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gorbatchev

customer_reviews.title: I'm lazy; this suits me
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works quite well - sometimes (rarely) it can't find the charger when it's done, but considering I've done nothing while it worked, carrying it home once in a while is no big deal. The charging station, however, needs improvement. When the vacuum starts and ends its cleaning cycle it runs over the charging tabs, and both tabs have been dislodged, preventing the vacuum from resettling itself. A design error, which I have been able to, but should not have had to, overcome. (I bent the tab back into place and glued it.)
customer_reviews.author: littleknown

customer_reviews.title: I love it. We have two German Shorthaired Pointers who ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. We have two German Shorthaired Pointers who leave hair around and my iClebo gets it all up. It was a Christmas gift from my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Meier, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great when first purchased....
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! This vacuum was great when we first purchased it and then after a little over two months it just goes in circles and does nothing. We have cleaned all sensors emptied the receptacle after each vacuum and clean everything impeccably. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: joann lynn

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does.  A keeper!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Been using for several months now just about every other day. Have 4 indoor cats and this works wonderfully at picking up any loose hair and other debris. However, it is not great at picking up tracked cat litter. It gets most of it but not all. So I give it a good instead of a great on that issue. Have not used the mop feature yet. We are very finicky housekeepers and this meets our standards. Were leery about purchasing this type of floor cleaner, but it has met our expectations and bumps around and does it duty. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: IN buyer

customer_reviews.title: Smart machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is smart. Works well at cleaning, mopping is not quite as good as sweeping but it works well either way. The only problem mopping is staying on top of changing out the mop pads, we have a lot of hard wood flooring to care for . Run time is very good, gets into corners well and it's efficient in not doing a lot of back tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother when her Samsung robot vacuum stopped working. She was very disappointed. This doesn't have near the suction of the Samsung. The thing goes in circles in nearly the same spot for an hour. It keeps bouncing. I was able to repair the Samsung and throw this out after one month. On the good side, it has nice battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked briefly. Customer support was unresponsive.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about 9 months and then stopped working. It will leave its base and vacuum briefly, then spend hours trying to return to the base. One of the side brushes broke off and I can't find where to order replacement parts. I emailed the company in March to ask for solutions but never heard back. I would consider reordering if they supported their product but at this point I'm going to look into other replacement options.
customer_reviews.author: Erika K.

customer_reviews.title: The online support for working this sucks. I couldn't get it to run properly in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sending this back. The online support for working this sucks. I couldn't get it to run properly in the schedule mode (it would clean about a three foot area and return to the base). I did fine transitioning from carpet to wood floors, but it would leave crumbs and stuff on the wood floors. It also didn't get every part of the floor every time. It was like it did what it wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love our Rosie!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little robot. We named her Rosie (the Jetson's robot maid). We have a Gordon Setter (goggle it...you will see the super long black haircoat) and a long haired black cat. The living room carpet is very light colored. We run Rosie daily and the carpet has never looked so good. I do have to clean out the roller every couple of days but I have to do that with my Dyson too. It is so quiet...sometimes it catches the dog sleeping and startles her. There are several problem areas where she gets stuck, so I lay down a roll of wrapping paper blocking that area, which is enough to make her change her course.
customer_reviews.author: S. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I purchased iClebo
customer_reviews.text: This has exceeded my expectations! I handles tile floors, area rugs and carpet with ease. It is a little louder than expected. It cleans dog hair, dirt, and small pieces of paper, etc. very well. It operates for about 2 1/2 hours before returning to the base for a charge. Really glad I purchased iClebo. Plan to purchase my daughter one for her house.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Always does its job!
customer_reviews.text: This robot works great for bare floors. Cleans really large areas without recharging.
customer_reviews.author: todd glyer

customer_reviews.title: I bought one last December, it worked for about ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last December, it worked for about 4 months then stopped. I contact customer support for Iclebo, and the seller of the Arte. Neither have bothered to respond. I now have a $400 door stop.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Millizer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, for light cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that shed really well. This does a pretty good job on the dog hair on the hardwood and tile, not so good on the rugs. One of the dogs kind of stands in the way, but the other attacks it. I can only run it when the dogs are outside. It really does work on the dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We recently replaced all the flooring in our house with wood laminate so having a robot vacuum was imperative. I checked out the recommendations on Consumer Reports and bout the iClebo. We are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in IClebo Arte and seller's refusal to refund purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum in February, only used it twice a week and carefully cleaned it after each use. Now, four months later the IClebo Arte YCR-M05 will not hold a charge and is basically useless. The seller will not refund our money either. I am disappointed in this product and would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love my iClebo! I've had mine for 4 months now with no issues. I have two large dogs and dark wood floors. Everytime I came home it looked like a bunny had exploded in my house with all the fur everywhere. Now when I come home it's spotless. The iclebo does a great job even over taller shag rugs. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: MisterSnazzy

customer_reviews.title: Good product but gets stuck in spots
customer_reviews.text: Picks up mostly everything, has a hard time returning back to its base and gets lost a little. Gets stuck under the refrigerator. But for the most part and for the price it works well! I would recommend it to my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I was able to acquire at a discounted ...
customer_reviews.text: No suction and tends to get lost more times than not. Good thing I was able to acquire at a discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: SKYHI

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use my iClebo everyday. It's quite, does the entire living room, dining room, entry way, two hallways and kitchen in 60 minutes. Picks up dog hair from all corners and under furniture. Very user friendly and easy to clean. I like the mopping feature. I like that I can schedule the vac for the same time everyday and if I'm away it continues to do it's job. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the Arte - When it works :(
customer_reviews.text: The iClebo Arte is a great little machine, when it works. However, ours stopped functioning correctly not long after we purchased it. Now it acts as if it is hitting invisible walls and giving us error codes. I contacted iClebo and was instructed to "clean the sensors," which I did...but that did not solve the problem. The I was instructed to flip the magnet on one of the wheels. Again, I did this but it didn't help either. I'm in limbo right now, waiting on the next step from support. I've been waiting for a week now for a response from the support department.
customer_reviews.author: BTG

customer_reviews.title: Broken Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked amazing at first... We set it to run on a timer when we were at work, and everyday when I got home the dust bin was full, my floors/carpets looked great, and I was really happy. Unfortunately after about a month (just outside of the return date) the left wheel stopped working. It feels like it has come unattached and just spins freely. Now the robot can only clean one spot. A circle. As it spins round and round before it figures its lost and gives up. I'm very disheartened as it was doing everything I wanted it to do before, but now I don't know how to fix it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: functioning great, but need to de-clutter house like a kid. Does great job at getting to place that are messed by self vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Ziemer

customer_reviews.title: It had no suction to get the fine dust. I just sweeps
customer_reviews.text: It had no suction to get the fine dust. I just sweeps. I have a Neato that is broken that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So far I have been satisfied with its performance after having it for couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been satisfied with its performance after having it for couple of months. It avoids dropping from stairs and climbs on door steps up to about 1 cm, which is very helpful. It'd be nice if it is easy to clean out long hair tangled in there, and indicates when the dust bin is full.
customer_reviews.author: lily Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and quick compared to my old Neato. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and quick compared to my old Neato. Be careful, your kitty may want to play with the side brushes...
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this robotic vacuum. After having two Neato vacuums and seeing this with good ratings in Consumer Reports, I decided to give it a try. The navigation is as expected, but he vacuum power/suction is terrible. The vacuum cannot even pick up dried oatmeal on the carpet. I haven't tried the mopping function, but it appears to be more like a wet swiffer than a mop. Emptying the dust container is easy, but I never pick up as much as I did with the Neato. Pretty expensive for something that is not going to save me time.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It does the job I expected and more! It is so nice to come home to clean hardwood floors and baseboards. It even stopped itself when it caught a stray loose strand in my berber carpet. That could have been a disaster. My cat has no problem with it either. Yeah! Now I need a drone that dusts.
customer_reviews.author: Immacolata S.

customer_reviews.title: a different complaint
customer_reviews.text: It is good so far, but I have a different complaint. Who on earth wrote the product description! I have never seen so many wrong spellings in such a short paragraph on amazon. Whoever is responsible must correct it NOW!
customer_reviews.author: kyung min

customer_reviews.title: We are totally satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: We are totally satisfied with this product. It works and is fun to watch. Sort of like a low maintenance pet! Be careful when charging that the brushes don't cover the charging contacts.
customer_reviews.author: byrdland bill

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job finding its way around and cleaning. One thing you need to know....it uses a camera to map its location. Make sure the area is well lit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Works well when the ceiling is even, there's minimal furniture, the lights are on, and you don't mind the robotic noise for twenty to thirty minutes. My family room & kitchen are connected, but the family room has a high ceiling and the kitchen has a normal 9' ceiling. This seems to confuse the robot. I wanted to run this at night downstairs while we were upstairs sleeping. Then I realized I'd have to keep the lights on during operation and go back down stairs to turn off the light before beddy-bye. Slow and noisy. I sat there watching it roll at a turtle's pace thinking I should just get out the vacuum. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well but intake clogs fairly quickly with pet hair
customer_reviews.author: James M Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing machine. It is wonderful to come every day to clean floors.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie truelove

customer_reviews.title: She says the cleaning power is amazing. I am planning on buying one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my elderly mother. She loves all the functionality and the fact that she does not have to lug out a heavy vacuum. She says the cleaning power is amazing. I am planning on buying one for my home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cornier

customer_reviews.title: A huge disappointment !
customer_reviews.text: On initial charge it stalled twice with error numbers displayed. Struggled on dense area rug, spinning aimlessly. Got confused when rotating position. Different setting to avoid rugs didn't always work. By then it had tried to navigate around the "trees" (chair legs) of our dining room. Its rectilinear tracks became angled as respects the base charging station. It crashed into base station once. A single star is being generous. It ran some 75 minutes when I decided to put it back in its box.
customer_reviews.author: Fatfreek

customer_reviews.title: The item works great.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions in English were barely legible. The item works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... Cleo and she predicts that my floors will stay wonderfully free of dirt and debris
customer_reviews.text: We named her Ms Cleo and she predicts that my floors will stay wonderfully free of dirt and debris. Fortunately she's nothing like the Psychic Ms Cleo and all her predictions actually come true!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: IClebo review
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It would be nice if we could program it to go twice a day. We have a dog that sheds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Roper

customer_reviews.title: I love this robot
customer_reviews.text: I love this robot! I programmed it to clean at 11 PM after we go to bed and it cleans the living room, kitchen and hallway and goes back to the base. we get up clean floor. Our floor is all wood and tile, no carpet. WE clean out the brush and dirt catcher and it is good to go for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Shibas1

customer_reviews.title: Could use better suction.  I enjoy watching it run & am impressed when it get to corners, where it goes over the area a few time
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery. Bottom rubber piece partially fell offf & dragging. Magnetic strip included not long enough to serve regular needs. Could use better suction. I enjoy watching it run & am impressed when it get to corners, where it goes over the area a few times. Speedy delivery. Nice to look at...
customer_reviews.author: Betibu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great nice not to have to watch it, does very good job
customer_reviews.author: Michel Williams

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this thing!
customer_reviews.text: really wanted this to work. tried it for a couple months and then discovered it just sucks. too bad. never cleaned properly.
customer_reviews.author: kirby watson

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT PERFORM AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: ROBOTIC VACUUM ROAMED IN A RANDOM PATTERN, RECROSSING AREAS ALRED VACUUMED MANY TIME. GOT STUCK BETWEEN LEGS OF CHAIRS AND COULD NOT ESCAPE. BRUSH GOT TANGLED IN THROW RUGS FREQUENTLY. TOOK OVER 30 MIN TO RETURN TO CHARGING STATION AFTER ROAMING RANDOMLY ABOUT THE HOUSE. COULD NOT TRUST IT TO WORK WITHOUT A LOT OF SUPERVISION.
customer_reviews.author: DR ELI WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Seams to be keeping the floors clean. Somewhat user friendly. It has a good review in consumers report. The directions were printed so small you need magnifine glass to read them. That's why I rated it a 4 Star.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product....Sometimes I just sit and watch it - fascination that it gets the whole room done - wherever you start it! But, I don't know how to use the floor mopping device and it doesn't really explain it very well in the brochure. I'm not sure if I have hooked it up correctly, because there was no water on the floor, as it passed...maybe someone else can explain what to do on this???
customer_reviews.author: Nansea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in iclebo
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of dog and cat hair. That being said, the tangle if hair in the brush was very difficult to remove and had to be done each time it was used. Plus after a few days after I got it, it started making very loud noise. It didn't seem to want to navigate in a logical manner and would go over and over the same area, missing the same areas.
customer_reviews.author: M. Counce

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only use this item 3 month now but it`s not working.
customer_reviews.author: CHS

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little device in vacuum squirrel finds the way around ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little device in vacuum squirrel finds the way around the house and I am happy to have purchased it
customer_reviews.author: David I. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: navigation is good but very low suction
customer_reviews.text: I tried lots of robotic vacuum cleaner and this one in one is one best for its navigation and one of the worst for its vacuuming. It makes no difference how great is robots navigation if it cant pick up dirt. Might as well get Neato is less money have good navigation and it picks up dirt. Pros Good Navigation Quiet LG is only one that makes less noise Have mop attachment Cons very weak vacuum build cheap sounds like its falling apart brush is high maintenance
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was on the top of the list in consumer reports. Great price and even better than the roomba. The vacuum is very accurate and very thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Philip DM

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend bought one and suggested I get one and I love it. I have it set to start at 3:00 a.m. and wake-up and she's back at the docking station charging after cleaning the floors of my house. I like it so much I've given her a name.
customer_reviews.author: David Batson

customer_reviews.title: horrible, my 400 dollar vacuum does not work and ...
customer_reviews.text: horrible, my 400 dollar vacuum does not work and no one is responding to email or phone calls
customer_reviews.author: Lori Solheim

customer_reviews.title: but this Iclebo was great when i first bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have been an amazon customer for a long time. This is my first time writing a review, because i never had a problem with my other purchase, but this Iclebo was great when i first bought it. Then it started to breakdown on me after a couples of months. I clean it throughly and did everything i was suppose to do. I try to call customer service but the PHONE NUMBER IS OUT OF SERVICE!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY AND TIME BUYING THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have this machine a year, it does not work any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy rip off!
customer_reviews.text: Received 2/1/16 vacuum stopped working 3/1/16 and merchant refuses to allow return.
customer_reviews.author: hawks lax

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth every penny! Our floors are dust and fur free even though we have 2 heavily shedding Pugs. Note that we have no carpet or rugs so I can only speak to its performance on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for animal hair
customer_reviews.text: The vacuuming is fantastic and really keeps up on the animal hair in the house. I have dark hardwood floors and EVERYTHING shows. I have a lot of floor space it it takes two hours to clean the whole floor, I am very impressed with the battery life. However, I was looking for something to help with the mopping as well and the pad does not stay wet and doesn't do a great job. All in all, I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stein

customer_reviews.title: no quiet there yet
customer_reviews.text: It cleans, it does its thing but not to the quality I was looking for. This device is more of a lazy sweep vs a deep clean. I would recommend roomba because it had more power to clean even carpets. The AI algorithm of the clebo is just not done, needs to work on its path finding algorithm.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning itself was fine though. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Did not navigate as described. Did not go on a straight (parallel) lines when it was building its route. Could not find a base 3 of 5 times. Cleaning itself was fine though. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what I needed it for. Haven't tried the mopping.
customer_reviews.author: E. P. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have all tile floors it works excellent my wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: kenneth hand

customer_reviews.title: arte
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this robot vacuum, it does a really good job pretty quietly. My only complaint is it is very confusing to program. My teenager had to set it up for me. That is not such a surprise, but if it stops for some reason (like I forgot to clean it out) and I have to interrupt its program I am not sure what sequence of buttons to press to restart!
customer_reviews.author: Sandart

customer_reviews.title: My friend likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friend and she loved it! I use iRobot myself...
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work at all. It would turn off mid cleaning, the mop feature does not have a resivour so you just wet a pad and have to keep chasing after it to keep mop pad wet then when the floor is wet the tires just spin and get stuck! Seller is impossible to deal with took me weeks to get them to allow a return then made me pay $30 to ship back and charged a $117 restock fee for an item that does not work and should not be put back on the self!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: It did program easily, and kept the floors pretty clean
customer_reviews.text: Kept getting stuck under our couch. Not sure why it wedged itself under, so I returned the vacuum. It did program easily, and kept the floors pretty clean. I liked it, but couldn't keep it with the couch issue.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: It is fascinating towatch and works as of now
customer_reviews.text: It is fascinating to watch and works as of now. One wonders how much will eventually be required in the way of battery or brush replacements.
customer_reviews.author: WKA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good one. No noise. . Just little bit hh
customer_reviews.author: sumin choe

customer_reviews.title: Sorry ewe bought this. Waste of Money.
customer_reviews.text: J made to run only 15 dqys....it cannot find its base unit anymore. No record but to contact manufacturer and see what they will do under warrenty terms. 2aste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The device I was shipped was a used NON-functioning device - a total ripoff
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Received in excellent packaging, directions straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Received in excellent packaging, directions straightforward. Haven't set timer yet, not anticipating any trouble. Only problem is leaving wires (electric cables, etc) in a loose bundle, e.g. near a multiplug outlet, that the vacuum can get into will cause tangling problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wayne Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I experienced all of the good things stated by other reviewers so I won't repeat ...
customer_reviews.text: I experienced all of the good things stated by other reviewers so I won't repeat them here. We have hardwood floors with several throw rugs that have long tassels. iClebo does not like tassels! She eats them and wraps them around the brush and then chokes. You then have to unpluck the tassels from the brush and restart her. We now have modified our routine to hand vacuum the larger heavier rugs and shake the smaller ones, then we place them on furniture up out of the way.Only then, we let iClebo do her work. Less than two hours later she's back in her docking station and the floors are very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry n

customer_reviews.title: I suppose it's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to consumer reports it does not work as well as the high end irobot 960, I suppose it's good for the price, and remote is nice, but irobot does a much better job of not getting stuck and moves around smarter.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: It quit working after about 6 uses. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: It quit working after about 6 uses. I have repeatedly tried to find out from the company how to get it fixed and I can get no response.
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: No regrets! Still think it's cool when it zooms around all by itself cleaning my house. It's really been a good product so far. It's been harder to use the more my house fills up with "stuff", but I'll work that out. A great, fun product :-) You will still need to have a deep-clean vacuum around if you have carpets, but for floor maintenance, WOW, so handy! It will do an OK, superficial clean on carpets, but I wouldn't depend on it as a "cleaning" tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dana P.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done...on hardwood.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully on my hardwood floors! Good battery life. Not good on carpet, but I read the reviews and knew that going into it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robot vacuum. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase. A great time-saver. Pros: - Edge brushes - Precise cleaning - Adjustability (carpet height, pads) Cons: - Occasionally has problems finding the base - Time limit on emptying the dust receptacle (otherwise it shuts down to save power and automatically resets)
customer_reviews.author: NotAnAuthority

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: We have wood flooring in the entire house and Arte does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the dirt bin is easy to clean out
customer_reviews.text: This is not a comparative review, as I've never used another robot vacuum. I can say that this works very well. It picks up a lot of dirt, returns consistently to its charging bay, and the dirt bin is easy to clean out. Wish I had bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Product not even a year old. Will not charge. Only used a time or 2 a week. Returning to the service center.
customer_reviews.author: lynn gordon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You will Love iClebo's Arte!
customer_reviews.text: EXCEEDED all of my expectations! I vacuum, or better, Arts vacuums daily and does a great job. We have recommended this to all of our friends and so far 3 orders have been placed! Easy to use. Easy to clean. Easy to charge. Everyone needs iClebo's Arte. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Cleans very well on hard floors. We don't use it for carpet, so I can't speak to that. It is very thorough. Very quiet. Doesn't get stuck under furniture. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Battery Drains Fast
customer_reviews.text: Battery drains pretty fast... May be it is just with the one i bought. Otherwise a good purchase. Navigation is ok, could be better. Sucks up the dirt effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Gourav

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! It really does slow down a little before it bumps the furniture, so there are no marks on table legs. It sometimes picks a rather strange pattern to finish a room, but finish it does. It moves easily from hard floor to cut pile carpet. We don't have pets, and the carpet is mid-height. Don't know how well it may work on those.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I am always amazed on how much dust and particles this little helper ...
customer_reviews.text: We use it infrequently, however it does the job. I am always amazed on how much dust and particles this little helper picks up.
customer_reviews.author: Der Juergenator

customer_reviews.title: it pretty much does the whole house
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I set it up with some laughs over the badly translated instruction book, but it went right to work on what I thought was clean carpet, and found an embarrassing amount of dust and lint. Once I got the hang of getting loose wires out of its way, it pretty much does the whole house, then turns around and parks itself to recharge. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bertha

customer_reviews.title: It is not useful as a mop
customer_reviews.text: It is not useful as a mop. The dirt is simply pushed around. We are satisfied with it as a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy for cabin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, for use at our mountain cabin. It works very well, the wife is very pleased, as it cleans the floors in the evening, or you can program other times during low traffic around the house. The dogs don't mind it (scared them only once), and aside from it getting stuck in some tight spaces sometimes, it vacuums the hardwood floors and rugs w/o having to change settings, and returns to its base most of the time (unless it gets stuck). I would recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckr

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed it didn't work out
customer_reviews.text: We had to return ours. The sensor was defective and it tended to spin around. It never cleaned an entire room and it had trouble finding the base. The areas it did clean, it cleaned very well. I'm disappointed it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum. Very versatile. I use it on our hardwood floors mostly. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: B. Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Glad I switched from iRobot
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with vacuum -- better suction than iRobot, the brushes seem to reach further, and it uses sensor as well as random technology to clean. It is also nmuch easier to clean than iRobot. The only down side is you can't schedule different cleaning times for different days.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Does not return to base, sporadic stop and starts. Had 2 Roombas decided to try this one. Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: ro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and effective at cleaning my wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and effective at cleaning my wood floors. Sure saves my back from pushing a vacuum cleaner around. I turn it on and head for the golf course. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Slattery

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I have a neato and a roomba in other places, but this iclebo blows them away.
customer_reviews.author: kburto

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: That is the item which my wife love it and my dog just hate.
customer_reviews.author: Dariusz DOBRON

customer_reviews.title: Love this robot
customer_reviews.text: Love this robot! Features work exactly as described. It does rarely get stuck between chair legs in our kitchen , but usually can back its way out. I Would recommend this product highly!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive maneuvering in complex areas. Truly automatic--you start ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive maneuvering in complex areas. Truly automatic--you start it and it finds all areas and cleans them. This technology is ready for mainstream use. The mopping doesn't work well on any of these robotic cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Christof Stork

customer_reviews.title: Fastastic
customer_reviews.text: What a helpful gift we bought each other. So helpful with dogs and tile floors💜🐾
customer_reviews.author: HHopper

customer_reviews.title: This looks nice but not good as iRobot products
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice but not good as iRobot products- container is too small. It can not go back to charge station.
customer_reviews.author: Shuhong Yu

product_meta.title: iClebo Arte Robot Vacuum Wet Mop All-Surface Cleaner, Good for Carpet & Hardwood Floor, Self-Cleans with Advanced Navigation Remote Control Camera-Mapping Technology
product_meta.description: Uses a triple CPU system with camera vision, power management & device control for one of the best & smartest robotic technologies in its class. Advanced navigation system detects ambient environment 200 times per second & does a rigorous 10,800 times per second movement analysis for superior cleaning. As the innovators of the first camera vision mapping technology, the “ARTE” robotic vacuum cleaner is still leading the way when it comes to vacuuming, sweeping, brushing and mopping. With its superior suction power, the algorithm cleaning patterns and its' extremely quiet movements, all of your carpet cleaning and floor polishing can be done while you are asleep making your life that much easier. Arte is designed to clean an entire area from room‑to‑room without missing a spot for up to 160 minutes. Once the battery gets low it will find its' way back to the charging station and continue to clean after it has fully charged. With the daily scheduled cleaning feature of Arte, it will automatically power itself on and clean your home or office without the need of your assistance. This model YCR-M05-10 has an on board triple CPU with built in obstacle detectors that senses objects in its' path allowing itself to maneuver around them while searching for the most efficient cleaning routes for picking up pet hairs, dirt, dust and allergens captured with the antibacterial HEPA filter.
feature_bullets: SMART DETECTION SENSORS: 15 built-in sensors increase cleaning efficiency and prevent robot from collision and dropping. Uses a triple CPU system with camera vision, power management & device control for one of the best & smartest robotic technologies in its class

CAMERA-BASED VISION MAPPING: The 130-degree wide-angle smart mapping system thoroughly analyzes the space and cleans with the least missed spots plus includes IF Remote control for quick cleaning control

CLEAN ON YOUR SCHEDULE: Set schedule for daily cleaning of entire areas from room-to-room. Arte will automatically power itself on and clean your home or office for up to 160-minutes without assistance. Features Auto Charge/Resume function for continous cleaning
ADJUSTS TO ENVIORNMENT: Slim design with Top to Bottom 3. 5-inch height, easily passes under furniture such as beds and sofas

WHAT'S IN THE BOX: iClebo Arte Robot Vacuum, 1 Charging Station, 1 North American Adaptor Cord, 1 Remote Control (includes Batteries), 1 Cleaning Brush, 2 Filter, 1 Side Brush, 1 Mop Plate, 2 Mop Pads, 1 Boundary Strip, User Manual, and Quick Guide.

VACUUM & WET MOP: Now your carpet cleaning and floor polishing can be done all with the Arte. Wet Mop features a detachable reusable wet microfiber cloth to shine the floors and advanced powerful suction systems for collecting various types of particles such as cereal, dirt, pet hair, and sand
